tagline: Move Deals from Lead to Close.
subtitle: The streamlined Notion pipeline board designed to help you increase sales velocity and close more deals.
whatsInItForMe: This template helps you identify bottlenecks and focus your efforts, shortening your sales cycle and increasing revenue.
target_audience: Sales-focused teams and founders who want to improve their sales process and increase revenue.
pain_point: A disorganized sales process leads to a slow sales cycle and lost revenue.
solution: This streamlined pipeline provides the structure needed to manage deals efficiently, reduce friction, and accelerate your sales cycle.
